documentation.title: Multi-line If Conditions
documentation.standard: Multi-line if conditions should be indented one level and each line should begin with a boolean operator. The end parenthesis should be on a new line.

code.title: Invalid: No indentation used on the condition lines.
Valid: Boolean operator at the start of the line.
Invalid: Boolean operator at the end of the line.
Valid: End parenthesis on a new line.
Invalid: End parenthesis not moved to a new line.
